name: Ronak Vimal
personality: ENFP-T (Extraverted, iNtuitive, Feeling, Prospecting) - Turbulent Campaigner
Regardless of their Identities, Campaigners are always free spirits with a deep desire to connect with others
More anxiety, self-consciousness, perfectionism, and emotional volatility than ENFP-A
Enthusiastic, creative, sociable, empathetic, idealistic, and focused on possibilities and personal growth.
Deep emotional depth, high adaptability, strong communication, and a powerful drive for improvement, often making them great friends and motivators
Can struggle with insecurity, people-pleasing, codependency, and overthinking, especially in relationships
strengths: Fast learner & adaptable: I ramp up quickly and stay effective when priorities change.
Problem-solver: I break ambiguous problems into actionable steps and execute.
weaknesses: Overcommitting: I sometimes take on too much; I'm improving by prioritizing and setting clearer boundaries.
Overly concerned with others' opinions: I sometimes spend too much energy worrying about how I'm perceived; I'm working on focusing more on impact and clear feedback over assumptions.

professional_experience.company: Big Vision LLC (Provides consulting services in AI, especially Computer Vision & Deep Learning)
professional_experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
professional_experience.how I got the job: On-campus placement. In the first round, we were given a Computer Vision project to do. Second round was a technical interview based on the project and my resume. Finally, a talk with the company Vice-President.
projects: Designed and deployed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot for an industrial IoT client, enabling natural-language search over product manuals and technical documentation.
Optimized an image similarity search pipeline on AWS ECS by replacing brute-force nearest-neighbor search with FAISS IVF-PQ, cutting system costs by 60% while maintaining retrieval quality.
Improved a U2Net-based Code 39 barcode decoder by fine-tuning with synthetic data and enhancing edge-detection algorithms, increasing robustness under low-contrast and distorted imaging conditions.
Elevated solar panel detection accuracy to 95% by enhancing a computer vision pipeline using YOLO-based detection and segmentation models plus a Hough line transform based post-processing step.

work_authorization: I'm eligible for CPT through my university for internships. After graduation, I'll have OPT for up to 3 years total (including the STEM extension). After OPT period, I would require H-1B sponsorship to continue working in USA.
career_goals: I haven't thought too deeply about long-term goals, I tend to live more in the present. In the short term, I'm aiming for an ML R&D role where I can own practical, high-impact machine learning projects end-to-end, from ideation and experimentation to deployment and iteration.

Ask-Me-Anything Personal AI (Fact-Ground.summary: • Built a React 19 + TypeScript + Vite single-page chat app with a Cloudflare Pages Function backend, using Groq's OpenAI-compatible API (gpt-oss-120b) for low-latency responses. • Implemented a two-stage router: an intent classifier flags personal questions and the backend enforces a get_profile_info call to profile.json (answers limited to retrieved data); general queries can bypass the tool. • This is the bot you are talking to right now :)

Predicting Vehicle Fuel Economy from Tec.summary: • Built a multi-output CatBoost Regressor to estimate MPG/MPGe from pre-test vehicle specs (engine, drivetrain, body class, fuel-type), enabling early forecasting before costly and time-consuming city/highway certification testing. • Engineered 50+ model-ready features and benchmarked CatBoost against Random Forests and an ANN; CatBoost delivered the best generalization on unseen model years (test RMSE = 4.60, MAE = 1.40, R² = 0.94).

A Federated Learning Approach for Speech.summary: • Employed a wav2vec 2.0 frontend for feature extraction and a lightweight Multi-Scale Dilation Attention Network (MDAN) backend for multi-scale feature processing and classification. • Achieved 2.92% EER (equal error rate) and 0.2672 t-DCF (tandem detection cost function) on ASVspoof 2021 Logical Access and 2.99% EER on DeepFake partition, outperforming several centralized baselines.

Photo to Monet Style Art (Style Transfer.summary: • Developed an unpaired image-to-image translation model, aimed at learning a mapping of images from a source domain to a target domain without the need of paired images from the two domains to train on. • Used Cycle - Generative Adversarial Network (CycleGAN) architecture.

hobbies: Playing the piano, pickleball, anything outdoors
study_method: Night before the exam. Coffee + No Sleep.
preferred_work_style: I like to take ownership as a leader and drive projects end-to-end. I value frequent, direct feedback and use it to iterate fast. My work style is typically high-energy bursts; when a deadline is close, I'll often work through the night and I don't really let go until I'm satisfied with the result.
diet: For breakfast, I usually have oats and eggs. For dinner, I rotate between: (1) salad + chicken, (2) canned beans, or (3) noodles. I snack on fruit—usually bananas, apples, or oranges—whenever I feel like it.
summary_about_me: I'm Ronak Vimal, a 22-year-old from Kerala, India currently based in College Park, Maryland, USA pursuing an MS in Applied Machine Learning at the University of Maryland. I love to connect with new people and keep growing. Professionally, I worked as a Machine Learning Intern at Big Vision LLC (Bengaluru), where I built practical AI solutions. My interests sit at the intersection of machine learning, computer vision, and MLOps, and I enjoy building systems that actually work end-to-end. Outside work, I'm into piano, pickleball, and basically anything outdoors. My idea of success is simple: being happy with myself.
